backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two leaderboard flag-indicator features and their related files/components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend leaderboard and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the ArtistLeaderboardPage with global styles.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Arti: Renders each artist’s row with rank, avatar, scores, trend, hype badge, and top‑10 US flag icon.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Hype: Displays a small animated saffron‑accented Hype badge with a flame icon.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Wraps the leaderboard header and maps artist data into ArtistRow components.
Static desktop‑only header row labeling rank, artist, score, and trend columns.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Rank: Shows up, down, or neutral indicators based on reach‑score shift values.
frontend/src/data/artistLeaderboardSampl: Sample dataset of 10 artists including ranks, avatars, reach scores, and trending flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including background, accent, and mandala pattern styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistLeaderboardPage: Renders the Artist Leaderboard page with themed styling, header/footer, and the Leaderboard component using sample data.
frontend/src/types/leaderboard.ts: Declares the Artist interface describing leaderboard artist fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme tokens, OKLCH color mappings, plugins, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, design goals, requirements, and image needs for the Artist Leaderboard feature.
